_metadata.description: Loudoun County community/HOA data for NewCo property intelligence platform
_metadata.notes: Subdivision patterns use wildcards - match subdivision names from GIS/RentCast data

fees.fee_notes: HOA dues include common area maintenance, trash removal, club social membership. Golf membership separate.

pool_details: Pool and tennis complex with fitness center
Community Center Pool (main pool, wading pool, spa)
Beacon Crest Pool (heated, spa, fireplace, club room)
Brambleton Corner Pool (8-lane lap, zero-depth beach entry)
Brambleton Crossing Pool (splashpad, water slide, beach entry)
amenities.fitness_notes: OneLife Fitness nearby (free 1-year membership for new homebuyers)
amenities.trails_certification: Runner Friendly Community (Road Runners Club of America)
other: Silver Line bus service to Ashburn Metro

fees.fee_notes: SF on VDOT streets $111; SF on private streets $137; 2026 rates approved November 2025

amenities.trails_notes: Miles of nature trails through Stream Valley Park
amenities.wildlife_certification: Certified Wildlife Habitat Community (National Wildlife Federation)

fees.fee_notes: Includes Sports Pavilion access for owners; condo fees may vary
Varies by property type and section; Savannah/Cedarwood SF higher (includes yard maintenance). Covers trash, recycling, snow removal

amenities.clubhouse_notes: Newly renovated clubhouse with fitness center and rental space

fees.fee_notes: Approximate average; varies by property type (detached ~$87, townhome ~$96). Contact HOA for current rates
Luxury community; fees include Xfinity high-speed internet and cable. SF fees vary by section
SF covers common areas; condos include pool, fitness
Varies by property type and section; maintains Central Park, Saranac Park, Town Center

one_loudoun.home_count_notes: 358-acre mixed-use community; SF, TH, and condos at buildout

fees.fee_notes: Base HOA + Conservancy fee; covers pools, trails, Lodge access. Conservancy increasing to $88 in 2025/2026

willowsford.notes: Extensive trails (~40 miles); fitness center at The Lodge; dog parks; multiple pools and courts

fees.fee_notes: Varies by property type; includes lawn care, cable/WiFi, trash removal

belmont_country_club.notes: Gated country club community with Arnold Palmer golf course; multiple pools, large clubhouse, fitness center, 7 tennis courts (hard & Har-Tru), pickleball, basketball courts, playgrounds, and walking trails. Amenities largely accessed via club membership.

fees.fee_notes: Varies by property type; covers pool, grounds, trash, common areas

amenities.trails_notes: Walking trails with W&OD Trail access
clubhouse_features: Community center with kitchen and fireplace

fees.fee_notes: County side vs town side pricing; includes trash and snow removal. Pool membership included in HOA fees

clubhouse_features: Available for resident rental on weekends

loudoun_valley_estates.hoa_name: Loudoun Valley Estates Homeowners Association, Inc.

fees.fee_notes: Covers trash, snow, pool, fitness, playgrounds, common areas

amenities.trails_notes: Multiple walking trails around scenic pond
clubhouse_features: Two clubhouses: Evergreen and Fair Ridge

fees.fee_notes: Pool access requires good standing with association. Covers landscaping, pool staffing, trash, snow removal

amenities.tot_lot_notes: Primary playground at clubhouse, additional at Twain Terrace, Sandburg, and Trowbridge townhomes

fees.fee_notes: Condo fees cover trash, snow removal, pool, common area maintenance

pool_details: Home to Kirkpatrick Farms Krakens Swim Team

kirkpatrick_farms.notes: Pool, tot lots, tennis & basketball courts, clubhouse, open field & interconnecting trails listed . the text in website does not explicitly confirm if the gym/fitness facility is actively available now

alexander_s_chase.notes: Community pool, tennis courts, clubhouse, walking trails, 2 playgrounds, basketball court (MLS / Google sources)

amberleigh.notes: Pool, tennis, fitness, walking trails, playground, basketball (MLS / Google sources)

autumn_oaks.notes: Pool, tennis, bocce courts, basketball, playgrounds, trails, Recreation Center (MLS / Google sources)

beacon_hill.notes: Pool, clubhouse, tennis, playground, basketball court, walking trail (MLS / Google sources)
beacon_hill.home_count_notes: Estate and hamlet homes on 1,100 acres

beauregard_estates.notes: Pool, tennis, clubhouse, trails, playground, basketball (MLS / Google sources)

belle_terra.notes: Pool, tennis, clubhouse, fitness center, trails, playground, basketball (MLS / Google sources)
belle_terra.home_count_notes: Estate homes on large lots, Ashburn

broad_run_farms.notes: Community has riverside access, pavilion, picnic area with swing set and benches but no formal pool, tennis, club amenities listed publicly — Broad Run Farms Civic Association parks and river property. (Broad Run Farms Civic Association)

cabin_branch_forest.notes: Quiet neighborhood backing to Claude Moore Park nature center; no pool/tennis/etc mentioned in public HOA description. (Cabin Branch Forest)

cardinal_glen.notes: No public amenities info available from HOA site or visible external descriptions.
cardinal_glen.home_count_notes: Sterling, own traffic light on Rt 7

connemara_woods.notes: Small community; no swimming pool, recreation center, or large common areas per official community description. (Connemara Woods Homeowners Association)

countryside.notes: Community contains three swimming pools, extensive paved walking trails/nature areas and multiple playgrounds per community area information (not HOA site). (Wikipedia)

courts_and_ridges_of_ashburn.notes: Clubhouse; community pool; tennis courts (no counts listed)
courts_and_ridges_of_ashburn.home_count_notes: SF and TH on 115 acres in Old Ashburn

exeter.notes: Pool, 4 playgrounds, tennis, basketball, trails (2+ miles), clubhouse

kincora.home_count_notes: 200 TH + 333 apts + 96 affordable (2,400 planned at buildout)

loudoun_crossing.notes: site mentions gym open and clubhouse areas; 2025 pool information page exists; MLS/management listings indicate pool, gym, tennis courts, tot lot/playground.
loudoun_crossing.home_count_notes: Condos in Aldie, built 2015-2017 by Ryan Homes

moorefield_station.home_count_notes: Current count; 592-acre development plans up to 6,000 homes at buildout

dulles_farms.notes: Multiple amenities .pools, 2 clubhouses with fitness rooms and meeting rooms, tennis courts, walking trails, dog park, playgrounds & nature areas per official Amenities listing.

loudoun_valley_ii.home_count_notes: Part of Loudoun Valley Estates complex

residences_at_dulles_parkway_center.home_count_notes: TH-style condos by K. Hovnanian, built 2011-2013

sycamore_hill.notes: Pool, 2 tennis courts, 5 playgrounds, basketball courts per official Amenities page

data_to_verify: HOA monthly fees for communities without 2024/2025 data
